ioedata.device.repository

Interface DeviceRepository<T,ID extends java.io.Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    ID -
    All Superinterfaces:
    BaseRepository<T,ID>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<T,ID>

    public interface DeviceRepository<T,ID extends java.io.Serializable>
extends BaseRepository<T,ID>
    This interface provides abstract methods specifically for device to access MongoDB. It will be implemented by DeviceRepositoryImpl class.
    Author:
    ajou

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DeviceValue findByDeviceNameAndUserSerialNum(java.lang.String deviceName, int userSerialNum)
      Get device information by device name and user serial number.

      Find all devices with a circle geospatial area using a coordinate.
      boolean isObjectExist(int userSerialNum, java.lang.String deviceName)
      Overload isObjectExist method to check whether device exists by user serial number and device name.
      com.mongodb.WriteResult updateDeviceActuators(DeviceValue deviceVal)
      Update actuator information of a device.
      com.mongodb.WriteResult updateDeviceSensors(DeviceValue deviceVal)
      Update sensor information of a device.
